mapper.select: SELECT U.UserId, U.Fullname, U.Username, U.ImageUrl, U.Gender, U.BirthDate, U.IdentifyCard, U.Phone, U.Email, USM.StoreId, U.Address, C.CityName, D.DistrictName, U.CreatedTime, U.UpdatedTime, U.ReasonInactive, S.StatusName FROM tblUser U JOIN tblStatus S ON U.statusID = S.StatusId LEFT JOIN tblUserStoreMapping USM ON U.UserId = USM.UserID JOIN tblDistrict D ON D.DistrictId = U.DistrictId JOIN tblCity C ON C.CityId = D.CityId WHERE U.userName = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblUser(Fullname, Username, Password, RoleId, ImageURL, Gender, BirthDate, IdentifyCard, Phone, Email, Address, DistrictId, statusId, CreatedTime) VALUES(#{fullName}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{roleId},#{imageURL}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{identifyCard}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{districtId}, #{statusId}, convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{createdTime}))
mapper.update: UPDATE tblUser SET Fullname = #{fullName}, ImageURL = #{imageURL}, Gender = #{gender}, BirthDate = #{birthDate}, IdentifyCard = #{identifyCard}, Phone = #{phone}, Email = #{email}, Address= #{address}, DistrictId = #{districtId}, UpdatedTime = convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{updatedTime}) WHERE UserName = #{userName}
UPDATE tblUser SET Password = #{password} WHERE UserName = #{userName} AND (StatusId = 1 OR StatusId = 3);
mapper.select: SELECT Email FROM tblUser WHERE UserName = #{userName}
SELECT StatusId FROM tblUser WHERE UserName = #{userName}
mapper.update: UPDATE tblUser SET StatusId = #{statusId} WHERE UserName = #{userName};
